title: Ticket #3125: Fix proper builds
description:
Update proper builds for V7.8 && >> because they have wonky behavior under the following conditions:

  • missing expat-devel -> tries to link -NOTFOUND
  • missing pcre-devel -> should fail outright
  • FORTIFY on debug binaries causes copious warnings.
  • missing libX11-devel -> should disable KBDD
remarks:

CODE REVIEW
